ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Paintables Patch
ModMetaData.author: Zergologist
ModMetaData.description:
Let me walk you through my thought process - I want a very simple, a very clean and overall unintrisive mod that gives me paintable objects in the vanilla game with the DLC. That can't be too hard to ask for, right? I only ask that you don't ask for more.
Base game rimworld has some strange things as non-paintable, like directly specifying in the code that animal flaps shouldn't be painted? If you want mod compatibility or a different selection of items paintable, go check out Paintable Spots and Objects. Affected Objects include: Animal Bed, Animal flaps, Armchair, Sandbags, Toolbox, Drapes, Ideograms, Kneel Pillows, Kneel Sheets, Autobong and All the floor coverings, literally all of them using the floor covering base
